articles.title: Harry and Meghan wish Kate 'health and healing' - BBC.com
articles.description: Prince Harry and Meghan say they hope Catherine and her family can heal "privately and in peace".

articles.title: ‘Ned’s Declassified’ Stars Say They Were Not Referring to Drake Bell in TikTok Joke: “We F***ed Up” - Hollywood Reporter
